name: I Try My Best
description:
This is one of my very first games, I created it for the Dublin Twine Jam (the site's gone I'm afraid) run by the amazing Dreamfeeel and AlphaChar.

I wanted to go for a kind of funny adventure game, with some scene-setting, a protagonist you empathise with and a couple of puzzles. It came together in about six or seven hours.

I hope you like it!
